properties.areaDesc: Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal westward out to 10 NM
properties.headline: Storm Warning issued February 1 at 2:10PM PST until February 3 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts to 50 kt and
combined seas 16 to 19 feet are expected when conditions are
worst.

* WHERE...Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal westward out to 10
NM.

* WHEN...For the Storm Warning, from noon Sunday to 3 AM PST
Monday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 3 AM to noon PST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Very strong winds will create exceptionally
dangerous sea conditions which could capsize or damage vessels
of all sizes.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should remain in port, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON PST SUNDAY... ...STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 3 AM PST MONDAY
